description:
Tired of waiting for ever for the Google Maps app to load just so you can get an idea of where you are?  Well, wait no more.  Quick Maps is the simplest, fastest mapping application out there.  Simple load it up, and it will give you a map of your current location.  No directions, no map panning, no bells and whistles.  Stop wasting time with those other apps when a simple map of your surroundings will suffice.

You can zoom in and out and hit the refresh button to get a new GPS Fix.
